entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:22 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 08:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 0.7°C
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 07:36 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 07:36 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 30%
